articles.description: Dean Smith has spelt out what Todd Cantwell needs to do to be a key part of Norwich City’s Championship promotion bid.
articles.content:
Dean Smith has spelt out what Todd Cantwell needs to do to be a key part of Norwich Citys Championship promotion bid.

articles.author: Eurosport
articles.title: Yan Bingtao: Former Masters champion suspended from snooker as part of match-fixing investigation - Eurosport UK
articles.description: Yan Bingtao has been suspended from competing on the World Snooker Tour with immediate effect.
articles.content:
Yan Bingtao of China walks out for their first round match against Chris Wakelin

articles.title: ‘We know what we’ve achieved’: Stokes lauds England’s series win in Pakistan - The Guardian
articles.description: Ben Stokes was in no doubt about the magnitude of England’s latest mind-boggling achievement after a tense victory over Pakistan clinched the series
articles.content:
Ben Stokes was in no doubt about the magnitude of Englands latest mind-boggling achievement after a tense, stomach-churning 26-run win in the second Test in Multan.

articles.author: Ali Martin
articles.title: England secure historic series win after Mark Wood breaks Pakistan resistance - The Guardian
articles.description: England have won the second Test in Multan by 26 runs to seal series victory as the hosts’ fightback fell just short
articles.content: Seventeen years since a nail-biting run chase in Multan was detonated spectacularly by Shoaib Akhtar, it was England who had the dynamite at their disposal. Mark Wood blew through Pakistan either sid… [+5416 chars]
